name: Remastery GNU/Linux distributions
short_description:
Remastery is an uniquely built set of Ubuntu-based GNU/Linux distributions. Еach one of them is featuring a surprisingly favourable combination of deeply customised desktop environment and carefully selected applications with lots of additional user-friendly adjustments. All modifications made in advance aim to accomplish an incredibly
comfortable consumer experience on a daily basis.

Remastery GNU/Linux distributions are still in development.

They will be released only when everything is ready.
summary: Aiming at accomplishing an incredibly comfortable consumer experience
